name: The moss accident
description:
Compo Submission for Ludum Dare 50 :  https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/the-moss-accident

As a biologist, you create a new genetically modified moss that expands quickly. A bit too quickly.

It's going to take over your lab, then the world.

Luckily, you came to work with your flamethrower.

Burn your experimental moss before it's too late.

–CONTROLS–

WSAD/Arrows -> move

Mouse -> Aim

Press Mouse Left -> Shoot (Your lighter works quite badly. It takes time to light the flamethrower.)
